classitems.description: Helper method to get the node's current 2d transfom matrix.
classitems.name: getMatrix

classitems.description:
Transforms the node by the inverse of the nodes current 2d transform
matrix.
classitems.name: inverseTransform

params.name: transitionConfig
params.description:
Optional.  If defined, and if the
transition module is available, a transition will be used to
transform the node.  This object is passed along to the transition
method.

params.name: callbackFunction
params.description:
Optional.  Whether or not
transition is used, the callback function, if defined, will get
called when the transform is complete.

classitems.description:
Transforms the node by multiplying the nodes current 2d transform
matrix with another matrix.
classitems.name: multiplyMatrix

params.name: matrix
params.description: The matrix to multiply.

params.name: transitionConfig
params.description:
Optional.  If defined, and if the
transition module is available, a transition will be used to
transform the node.  This object is passed along to the transition
method.

params.name: callbackFunction
params.description:
Optional.  Whether or not
transition is used, the callback function, if defined, will get
called when the transform is complete.

params.name: angle
params.description: The angle specified in degrees.

params.description:

params.name: callbackFunction

classitems.description: Transforms the node by the given matrix.
classitems.name: transform

params.name: matrix
params.description: The 2d transform matrix.

params.name: transitionConfig
params.description:
Optional.  If defined, and if the
transition module is available, a transition will be used to
transform the node.  This object is passed along to the transition
method.

params.name: callbackFunction
params.description:
Optional.  Whether or not
transition is used, the callback function, if defined, will get
called when the transform is complete.

classitems.description: Translates the node horizontally and vertically.
classitems.name: translate

params.name: x
params.description: The amount to translate horizontally.

params.name: y
params.description: The amount to translate vertically.

params.name: transitionConfig
params.description:
Optional.  If defined, and if the
